position_name: Web Application Administrator / Camunda BPM Developer
job_description:
Developed and maintained business processes within Camunda BPM using Java and JavaScript, ensuring seamless integration with the TSM system.

Analyzed development requests and determined the need for backend involvement, collaborating with external vendors when necessary.

Worked in an Agile environment, managing tasks and progress through Jira, and ensuring timely delivery of development projects.

Troubleshot and resolved system issues, focusing on development-related problems and ensuring the stability and efficiency of the deployed processes.
job_detail:
I began my role as an administrator for the Telco Management System (TSM), a web application that integrates CRM, order management, and a ticketing system, all orchestrated through Camunda BPM processes. The system's architecture includes various interconnected components, such as user management, forms, and other configurations, each of which required precise and consistent updates.

Initially, my responsibilities focused on modifying and managing forms within the system. As I gained more experience, my role evolved significantly, with a primary focus on developing and refining business processes within Camunda BPM. Camunda BPM is a robust process automation tool that leverages Java and JavaScript to implement complex workflows. It provides a flexible and scalable environment for managing business processes, making it an integral part of the TSM.

My role was deeply embedded in an Agile framework, working within sprints and managing tasks through the Jira ticketing system. I received development requests, which I thoroughly analyzed to determine the scope of work. If the request required backend intervention, I collaborated with external developers; otherwise, I handled the development directly within Camunda. Additionally, I was responsible for troubleshooting and resolving issues, whether they arose from testing errors or system bugs, but over time, my focus narrowed primarily to development and the correction of my own development tasks.

job_description:
Diagnosed and resolved technical issues, including troubleshooting system errors, correcting data entry mistakes, and maintaining connectivity, internet access, and VoIP communication functionality.

Managed user accounts and system security by overseeing provisioning, implementing access controls, and customizing Windows and Mac OS settings for optimal system compatibility.

Collaborated with higher-level IT teams to escalate and resolve complex technical problems, ensuring quick resolution and minimal disruption to user productivity.
job_detail:
In this role, I provided Level 1 IT user support for a system implemented across hygiene stations, primarily focused on the critical task of COVID-19 patient tracing. This position was pivotal in my understanding of large-scale IT systems, particularly in terms of system administration and user management.

My primary responsibility was to assist users with a range of technical issues, ensuring the system's smooth operation. This involved managing user accounts, including provisioning new accounts, controlling access, and maintaining security protocols. A significant portion of my role involved resolving errors and data inconsistencies in system records, often caused by incorrect inputs from users. For more complex or critical system issues, I collaborated closely with higher-level IT teams and developers, escalating and communicating detailed problem descriptions to ensure efficient resolution.\n\n Additionally, I provided comprehensive IT support to users, ensuring they had proper connectivity, access to the internet, and that VoIP communication tools functioned correctly. I also customized Windows and Mac OS settings to ensure compatibility with the system, enabling users to work efficiently regardless of their platform.

This position gave me valuable experience in troubleshooting, user support, and the administration of complex systems, laying a strong foundation for my subsequent transition into more development-focused roles.

job_description:
Developed and customized frontend features using HTML, CSS, SaaS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript, while addressing website functionality issues through a ticketing system.

Managed and optimized complex data structures using MySQL, ensuring efficient content organization and retrieval for web applications.

Worked with legacy ASP and PHP for web development, focusing primarily on frontend tasks while implementing new features and functionalities based on customer needs.
job_detail:
After dedicating time to learning programming, particularly with a focus on frontend development, I sought opportunities to apply my skills in a real-world setting. I secured a part-time position providing web development and support services for sports club websites. This role offered me invaluable experience in understanding the practical aspects of web application development and allowed me to refine my skills across multiple areas of web development.

My responsibilities included addressing reported issues and requests through a ticketing system, troubleshooting and fixing website functionality to ensure a seamless user experience. I implemented new features and functionalities based on customer requirements, working with a variety of programming languages, including ASP (for legacy projects) and PHP (for newer developments), though my primary focus remained on frontend tasks.

I managed and customized website layouts and styles using HTML, CSS, SaaS (CSS preprocessor), and Bootstrap, implementing dynamic functionality using JavaScript. Additionally, I worked with MySQL databases to manage complex data structures and organize website content effectively. This position not only enhanced my technical skills but also deepened my understanding of the web development process from both a frontend and backend perspective.

job_description: Provided comprehensive administrative support, including organizing team events, preparing Excel reports and pivot tables for the sales department, assisting HR with recruitment and contract management, and managing data updates in a CRM system.
job_detail: As an Office Assistant for a small cybersecurity firm, I played a versatile role, handling a wide range of tasks to support the smooth operation of the company. My responsibilities extended from typical administrative duties, such as preparing coffee and organizing team-building events, to more specialized tasks like assisting the HR department with candidate searches and contract preparation. I also managed various reports for the sales and finance departments, ensuring accurate data was provided for business decisions. Additionally, I worked with a basic CRM system, where I handled data updates and modifications to support the sales team's activities.

job_description: Processed and analyzed sensor data for autonomous vehicles, including manual annotation and validation of data accuracy, and later validated machine learning-generated annotations to ensure the correct processing of environmental data.
job_detail: In a development center focused on autonomous vehicle technology, I worked on a project dedicated to enhancing the functionality of self-driving cars. These vehicles are equipped with cameras and LIDAR (Light Detection and Ranging) systems that map their surroundings. My primary role involved processing and analyzing the data captured by these sensors, known as annotations. I meticulously validated the accuracy of these annotations, ensuring that my colleagues' work met the project's standards. As the project progressed and the volume of data increased, machine learning algorithms were introduced to generate these annotations automatically. My responsibility then shifted to validating the accuracy of the machine-generated data, ensuring that the computer processed the information correctly.

job_description: Verified and processed invoices and operational records, ensuring accurate data management in SAP, while supporting system automation efforts.
job_detail: As an Administrative Clerk for a logistics company, I reviewed and verified invoices and trucking operation records, ensuring accurate data entry and reconciliation in SAP. I also contributed to the automation and improvement of internal systems.
